import sys

for __ in range(input()) :
    n = input()
    if n < 7 :
        if n%4==0 :
            print 0
            continue
        else :
            print "-1"
            continue
    four = (n%7)
    if four%4 == 0 :
        print n-four
    else :
        temp , ans , found = n-four , 0 , False
        while temp >=0 :
            if four%4==0 :
                found = True
                break
            temp -= 7
            four = n-temp
        if not found :
            print "-1"
        else :
            print temp
